title: NLA: T209-1 Contentnea Color, Gilmore; Raw about 1.5 - $NLA.

posts.post_title: NLA: T209-1 Contentnea Color, Gilmore; Raw about 1.5 - $NLA.
posts.post_content:
It's Back to the Collection Box.

Tough set and one of the pretty 16 colored ones.
Without the "Factory #" stamp.

As always, the first "I'll take it" below trumps any PM negotiations.
Free shipping with tracking.
Paypal or Venmo accepted.
